name: Lost & Found (Annerion)
description: Lost & Found is a randomly generated puzzle game where you play as a child sent by your mother to your school’s lost and found to retrieve a lost possession. The only problem is between your mum and the front desk you forgot what you were supposed to be getting. As a result, the receptionist gives you 3 minutes to figure out what your item is before they go and get your mum. Using information provided by the various items in lost and found and your deductive reasoning, in a system resembling clue / cluedo, you must figure out what your item is before you get in trouble with your mum.
